SELECT csa.id, csa.a_sp_id as aSpId, csa.b_sp_id AS bSpId, csa.status, csa.modify_dt, csa.spaName AS spaName, csa.spaMobile AS spaMobile, csb.name AS spbName, csb.mobile AS spbMobile, COUNT(co.cp_relation_id) AS task FROM ( select cr.id, cr.`status`, cr.modify_dt, cr.`a_sp_id`, cr.`b_sp_id`, cr.dr, cr.modify_dt AS spaModifyDt, csa.name AS spaName, csa.mobile AS spaMobile from cp_relation AS cr LEFT JOIN cp_service AS csa ON cr.a_sp_id = csa.saas_sp_id AND csa.dr = 0
GROUP BY cr.id ) csa LEFT JOIN cp_service AS csb ON csa.b_sp_id = csb.saas_sp_id AND csb.dr = 0 AND csb.isuse = 1 LEFT JOIN cp_order AS co ON csa.id = co.cp_relation_id AND co.dr = 0 AND co.stage > 1 AND csa.dr = 0
AND (csa.spaName like '%${spaName}%' or csa.spaMobile like '%${spaName}%') AND (csb.name LIKE '%${spbName}%' OR csb.mobile LIKE '%${spbName}%') AND spaModifyDt>=#{modifyDtFrom} AND spaModifyDt<=concat(substring(#{modifyDtTo},1,10),' ','23:59:59') AND csa.status = #{status} AND csa.id = #{id}
GROUP BY csa.id ORDER BY csa.modify_dt DESC
